mapper.insert: insert into xt_yh (PKID, SSJG, YHMC, YHMM, YHLX, SFGLY, SGRQ, XB, CSRQ, SFZH, CSD, LXDZ, YZBM, GZDH, YDDH, YX, QMZP, XL, BYYX, BYRQ, SXZY, YHZT, XTFG, TBFG, BZ, CJRZH, CJRMC, CJSJ, ZHXGRZH, ZHXGRMC, ZHXGSJ, DLLXSBCS, ZHYCDLSJ, shzt, shr, shsj, shyj) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhmm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfgly,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sgrq,jdbcType=DATE}, #{xb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csrq,jdbcType=DATE}, #{sfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lxdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yzbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gzdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yddh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qmzp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{byyx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{byrq,jdbcType=DATE}, #{sxzy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xtfg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbfg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjrzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zhxgrzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zhxgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zhxgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dllxsbcs,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{zhycdlsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shsj,jdbcType=DATE}, #{shyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update xt_yh set SSJG = #{ssjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YHMC = #{yhmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YHMM = #{yhmm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YHLX = #{yhlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFGLY = #{sfgly,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SGRQ = #{sgrq,jdbcType=DATE}, XB = #{xb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSRQ = #{csrq,jdbcType=DATE}, SFZH = #{sfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSD = #{csd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LXDZ = #{lxdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YZBM = #{yzbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GZDH = #{gzdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YDDH = #{yddh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YX = #{yx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QMZP = #{qmzp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XL = #{xl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BYYX = #{byyx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BYRQ = #{byrq,jdbcType=DATE}, SXZY = #{sxzy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YHZT = #{yhzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XTFG = #{xtfg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TBFG = #{tbfg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CJRZH = #{cjrzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CJRMC = #{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CJSJ = #{cjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZHXGRZH = #{zhxgrzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZHXGRMC = #{zhxgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZHXGSJ = #{zhxgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DLLXSBCS = #{dllxsbcs,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ZHYCDLSJ = #{zhycdlsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, shzt = #{shzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shr = #{shr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shsj = #{shsj,jdbcType=DATE}, shyj = #{shyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PKID, SSJG, YHMC, YHMM, YHLX, SFGLY, SGRQ, XB, CSRQ, SFZH, CSD, LXDZ, YZBM, GZDH, YDDH, YX, QMZP, XL, BYYX, BYRQ, SXZY, YHZT, XTFG, TBFG, BZ, CJRZH, CJRMC, CJSJ, ZHXGRZH, ZHXGRMC, ZHXGSJ, DLLXSBCS, ZHYCDLSJ, shzt, shr, shsj, shyj from xt_yh where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
